N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 205.2 - Voluntary interest arbitration

State Regulations
(a) In the event that a public employer and a certified or recognized employee
organization agree to submit any unresolved issue in negotiations to
arbitration, they may request the assistance of the board in providing for such
arbitration by a letter directed to the director of conciliation. (b) The written request may be initiated by
either party and shall be accompanied by a copy of the submission. (c) An arbitrator shall be designated
pursuant to the selection process established by the director of conciliation, which process will give the parties an opportunity to participate in the
selection of the arbitrator. Notes
